​

Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1-4%

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

Aroma: Pleasant & Natural Sweet Strawberry Aroma with a mild note of Artificial Strawberry - Natural SB aroma similar to Strawberry Ripe (TPA)

​

Single Flavor Test:  3%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | TigerTek Morphe RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

​

1 Week Steep

\- Flavor Description: Natural. Lightly Sweet. Bright, Citrusy Semi-Ripe Strawberry; Light note of Artificial Strawberry Candy. Rounded but not Thick and Sticky Gummy Like Flavor on exhale. Full Bodied with a Smooth & Dense Mouthfeel.

‚Üë in Sweetness and Artificial Candy SB = Even Combo Artificial & Natural SB. Mouth feel is Fuller and more Rounded.

3 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape: Overall Unchanged from Week 2

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural and Artificial. Combination of a Bright, Citrusy Semi-Ripe Strawberry (dominate) & Sweet Artificial Strawberry Candy with a Lightly Sticky & Soft Gummy-like texture. Moderately Full Bodied with a Smooth & Rounded Mouthfeel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes No Identifiable Off Notes

\-  Similar qualities to Glazed Strawberry (VTA) but with an Artificial edge

\- Uses: Candy, Bakeries & Beverages - Milkshakes
